name: MIS Summary of Money Transactions
description:
Shows transactions and totals for the Spend, Private and Savings trust accounts per prisoner on a specified transaction date for a single establishment. Data for each account type is shown on a separate report tab. A balance for each prisoner is included for the end of that day/beginning of the next day.
FIN0029 v00.00.09

dataset.name: Spend Transactions
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'CR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS CREDIT_AMOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'DR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS DEBIT_AMOUNT, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_SEQ, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('dpotter') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND ((AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE) = (TO_DATE('17-08-2014 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))) AND AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2102) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_SEQ, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, SURNAME, INITIALS, DAY_DATE, DESCRIPTION, TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, CREDIT_AMOUNT, DEBIT_AMOUNT, TXN_ID, TXN_ENTRY_SEQ, ACCOUNT_CODE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Account Balance Spends
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE, SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE END, 0)) AS SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('dpotter') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND ((TO_DATE('17-08-2014 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) = (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE)) AND AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2102 AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN WHERE (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('dpotter') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (((AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE) = (TO_DATE('17-08-2014 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))) AND AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2102 AND AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DAY_DATE, SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load End Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT TRUNC(BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_END_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT LOAD_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Private Cash Transactions
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'CR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS CREDIT_AMOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'DR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS DEBIT_AMOUNT, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_SEQ, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('dpotter') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND ((AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE) = (TO_DATE('17-08-2014 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))) AND AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2101) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_SEQ, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, SURNAME, INITIALS, DAY_DATE, DESCRIPTION, TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, CREDIT_AMOUNT, DEBIT_AMOUNT, TXN_ID, TXN_ENTRY_SEQ, ACCOUNT_CODE, ABS(PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTIONS.CREDIT_AMOUNT - PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTIONS.DEBIT_AMOUNT) AS V_PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTIONS_39, SUM(PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTIONS.CREDIT_AMOUNT - PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTIONS.DEBIT_AMOUNT) AS V_TOTAL_PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSAC33 FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Savings Transactions
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'CR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS CREDIT_AMOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'DR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS DEBIT_AMOUNT, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_SEQ, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('dpotter') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND ((AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE) = (TO_DATE('17-08-2014 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))) AND AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2103) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_SEQ, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, SURNAME, INITIALS, DAY_DATE, DESCRIPTION, TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, CREDIT_AMOUNT, DEBIT_AMOUNT, TXN_ID, TXN_ENTRY_SEQ, ACCOUNT_CODE, ABS(SAVINGS_TRANSACTIONS.CREDIT_AMOUNT - SAVINGS_TRANSACTIONS.DEBIT_AMOUNT) AS V_SAVINGS_TRANSACTIONS_LINE_34, SUM(SAVINGS_TRANSACTIONS.CREDIT_AMOUNT - SAVINGS_TRANSACTIONS.DEBIT_AMOUNT) AS V_TOTAL_SAVINGS_TRANSACTIONS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Account Balance Private Cash
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2101' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53, SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.HOLD_BALANCE END, 0)) AS SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51 FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('dpotter') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND ((TO_DATE('17-08-2014 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) = (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE)) AND AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2101 AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN WHERE (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('dpotter') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (((AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE) = (TO_DATE('17-08-2014 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))) AND AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2101 AND AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DAY_DATE, SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53, SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51, ABS(PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTIONS.CREDIT_AMOUNT - PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTIONS.DEBIT_AMOUNT) AS V_PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTIONS_39, SUM(PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTIONS.CREDIT_AMOUNT - PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTIONS.DEBIT_AMOUNT) AS V_TOTAL_PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSAC33 FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53
field.display: Sum of Private Cash Account Available Opening-Balance

field.name: SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51
field.display: Sum of Private Cash Account Holding Opening-Balance

dataset.name: Account Balance Savings
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2103' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_OPENI38 FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('dpotter') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND ((TO_DATE('17-08-2014 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) = (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE)) AND AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2103 AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN WHERE (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('dpotter') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (((AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE) = (TO_DATE('17-08-2014 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))) AND AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2103 AND AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DAY_DATE, SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_OPENI38, ABS(SAVINGS_TRANSACTIONS.CREDIT_AMOUNT - SAVINGS_TRANSACTIONS.DEBIT_AMOUNT) AS V_SAVINGS_TRANSACTIONS_LINE_34, SUM(SAVINGS_TRANSACTIONS.CREDIT_AMOUNT - SAVINGS_TRANSACTIONS.DEBIT_AMOUNT) AS V_TOTAL_SAVINGS_TRANSACTIONS FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_SPEND_TRANSACTION_LINE_AMO31 IS NOT NULL)

field.name: $ref:V_PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTIONS_39
field.legacySql: =Abs([Private Cash Transactions].[Credit Amount]-[Private Cash Transactions].[Debit Amount])

field.name: $ref:V_TOTAL_PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSAC33
field.legacySql: =Sum([Private Cash Transactions].[Credit Amount]-[Private Cash Transactions].[Debit Amount])
